name: kalpa
title: Kalpa
description: Search and manage your saved links in Kalpa - your cosmic link manager
author: bluemelon

commands.name: search-links
commands.title: Search Links
commands.subtitle: Kalpa
commands.description: Search and open your saved links

commands.name: quick-save
commands.title: Quick Save
commands.description: Save the current browser URL to Kalpa

commands.name: recent-links
commands.title: Recent Links
commands.description: View your most recently saved links

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
